title: NYC Wine & Food Festival
seo_title: NYC Wine & Food Festival | WestHouse Hotel New York
seo_description: Hosted by the Food Network and Cooking Channel, the New York City Wine & Food Festival is a four day fair with more than 100 events.
preview: Hosted by the Food Network and Cooking Channel, the New York City Wine & Food Festival is a four day fair with more than 100 events.
contents:
Hosted by the Food Network and Cooking Channel, the New York City Wine & Food Festival is a four day fair with more than 100 events. The 2016 edition will see more than 500 celeb chefs, culinary professionals and wine producers take over Piers 92 and 94 on the Hudson River. Expect to see the Giada de Laurentiis, Dominique Ansel and Andrew Zimmern at this star-studded festival. Last year’s mix of private dinners, meet-and-greets, hands-on cooking classes, parties and tasting events attracted over 55,000 visitors. The best part of NYCWFF? All proceeds raised help fight hunger, and go to the No Kid Hungry campaign and Food Bank for New York City.

 

For more information, visit the NYC Wine & Food Festival website.

Photo by @purewow.
